verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daiva prema pridviloni yannitini minchunu Yesu maalo nivasinchu madi maa vimukhtiye Nee kamoolya prema yundu neevu prema moortive Nee daasula mainamammu grupato rakshinchumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mammu samrakshinchu shakhti nee kundu maa Prabhuvaa yenna denna deni needu sannidini baayamu Nin stutinchu chundi memu sarvadaa sevintumu Nin braardhinchi poorna prema me matishayintumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Krothagaa mammu srujinchi paapa mella baapumu Maaku swastata nosangi goppa rakshana joopumu Bhakhti yabhi vruddhi pondi swarga mandu Jeragaa vintanondi prema stuti nee karpintu mepudu{/lang-eng}
